item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-08-14
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Getting car inspected. Back in Florida (when it cared about emissions) there were dedicated stations for this. Why isn't it the same here? #
  • I'm at Sweet Tomatoes Pizza (Newton) (47 Langley Road, Newton). #
  • Ghostbusters the movie, free on Youtube. There goes my productivity. #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
